title: Imperfect Books Archives
cleaned_text: Imperfect Books Welcome to our discount book section! Sometimes in the process of shipping a book to us or in the process of the book being stored for an extended period of time it starts to show shelf wear or slight damage on the cover. So if a book doesn't look "new" anymore we offer a discount on this book and place it in this special section here. These books are not sale books and will not be offered for a discount on a regular basis. These discounts are related to accidental damage only. We do not sell used books. You can find some real gems here! Showing 1-100 of 253 results - [Discount](https://earthschooling.info/thebearthinstitute/product/the-phantom-of-the-opera-hardcover-discount-book/) The Classic Starts: Phantom of the Opera: Hardcover: DISCOUNT BOOK [Add to cart](?add-to-cart=65920) -
